Max-Height

# Max-Height

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                | Support        |
| -------------------- | -------------- |
| ```
max-h-0
```      | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
max-h-[n]
```    | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
max-h-{n}
```    | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
max-h-full
```   | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
max-h-screen
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
max-h-min
```    | 🌐 Web only    |
| ```
max-h-max
```    | 🌐 Web only    |
| ```
max-h-fit
```    | 🌐 Web only    |
